entry.title: What I am looking for
entry.content:
What I am Looking For

A girl who want to enrich her spiritual world, a creed rooted in her mind, which is the meaning of life is not about length, but in whether it can create much value in a limited life-time. Perhaps for me, the meaning of life lies on the way to……

 

 

My Research Background

I studied for my postgraduate degree in Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Undergradute degree in Anqing Normal University, and both majored in Environmental Science and Engineering, especially focused on Environmental Chemistry. For the environmental discipline itself, it is an interdisciplinary which aim at finding sustainable ways from the perspective of chemistry, including pulltants treatment, energy capture and generation………

 

My Research Experience

With some aritles published on the Chemistsy Catalysis and Envrionmental Science direction publications, so I accoumulate many skills and ablibity to do projects and researches indepently, Some experiences are listed below.......

Research/Project Experiences

  National Nature Science Foundation of China(NSFC) | 2018.10-present

  • Director: Prof. Jinping Jia & Prof. Kan Li
  • Topic: Composition System of Electrochemical H2 Evolution and Bimetallic catalytic for Nitrate Reduction

 National Contest on Energy Saving and Emission Reduction | 2015.04-2016.05

  • Mentor: Prof. Kuan Zhao
  • Topic: Design an efficient device for degrading volatile organic gas (VOCs)

 Undergraduate Course Graduation Thesis | 2017.04-2018.05

  • Director: Prof. Fasong Li
  • Topic: Effect of Burning Ban Regulations on Anqing’s Air Quality during the Spring Festival

My Interesrs & Hobbits

From Sports to Running, Photography to Vedio clip, I would like to travel all corner of the world, within the limited lifetime, make more friends with people who also have the most enthusiastic，passionate and same interests.

Contact Me

Weibo | Github | E-mail | Bilibili

entry.title: Hello, nice to meet you!
entry.content:
Who I Am

I’m a postgraduate student and applying PhD program in Chemistry, Metallic Catalysis and Nano-materials Application. With undergraduate and graduate studies and accumulation, I am very eager to continue my PhD study, enrich my academic background, and continue to be a purely accomplished student, scholar…….

 

What I am Looking For

A girl Who want to enrich her spiritual world, a creed rooted in her mind, which is the meaning of life is not about length, but in whether it can create much value in a limited life-time. Perhaps for me, the meaning of life lies on the way to......

 

My Research Background

I studied for my postgraduate degree in Shanghai Jiao Tong University, Undergradute degree in Anqing Normal University, and both majored in Environmental Science and Engineering, especially focused on Environmental Chemistry. For the environmental discipline itself, it is an interdisciplinary which aim at finding sustainable ways from the perspective of chemistry, including pulltants treatment, energy capture and generation…….

 

My Research Experience

With some aritles published on the Chemistsy Catalysis and Envrionmental Science direction, also accoumulating many skills and ablibity to do indepently projects and researches, such as follows.....

Research/Project Experiences

  National Nature Science Foundation of China(NSFC) | 2018.10-present

  • Director: Prof. Jinping Jia & Prof. Kan Li
  • Topic: Composition System of Electrochemical H2 Evolution and Bimetallic catalytic for Nitrate Reduction

 National Contest on Energy Saving and Emission Reduction | 2015.04-2016.05

  • Mentor: Prof. Kuan Zhao
  • Topic: Design an efficient device for degrading volatile organic gas (VOCs)

 Undergraduate Course Graduation Thesis | 2017.04-2018.05

  • Director: Prof. Fasong Li
  • Topic: Effect of Burning Ban Regulations on Anqing’s Air Quality during the Spring Festival

My Interesrs & Hobbits

From Sports to Running, Photography to Vedio clip, I would like to travel all corner of the world, within the limited lifetime, make more friends with people who also have the most enthusiastic，passionate and same interests.

Contact Me
